00035 template <class T>
00036 class Array {
00037 public:
00038      inline Array(long nbOfRows,long nbOfColumns){
00039     nbColumns = nbOfColumns;
00040     nbRows = nbOfRows;
00041     array = new T[nbRows * nbColumns];
00042   };
00043   
00044   inline Array():nbColumns(0),nbRows(0),array(0L){};
00045   
00046      inline ~Array(){
00047     delete []array;
00048   };
00052   inline void setSize(long nbOfRows,long nbOfColumns){
00053     nbColumns = nbOfColumns;
00054     nbRows = nbOfRows;
00055     if(array) delete[]array;
00056     array = new T[nbRows * nbColumns];
00057   };
00058   
00066   inline T operator()(long row,long column) const{
00067     return array[(row - 1)*nbColumns + (column - 1)];
00068   };
00076   inline T& operator()(long row,long column){
00077     return array[(row - 1)*nbColumns + (column - 1)];
00078   };
00086   inline T& operator[](long position){
00087     return array[position];
00088   };
00093   inline long nbOfRows() const{
00094     return nbRows;
00095   };
00100   inline long nbOfColumns() const{
00101     return nbColumns;
00102   };
00103 
00104 
00109   inline void copyAndPrependColumn(Array& source){
00110     for(long i = 0;i < nbRows;++i)
00111       memcpy(&array[i * nbColumns + 1],&(source.array[i * source.nbColumns]),
00112              source.nbColumns * sizeof(T));
00113   };
00114 
00121   inline void copySubset(Array& source,long lastColumnToCopy){   
00122     for(long i = 0;i < nbRows;++i)
00123       memcpy(&array[i * lastColumnToCopy],&(source.array[i * source.nbColumns]),
00124              lastColumnToCopy * sizeof(T));
00125   };
00126 
00135   inline void copySubset(Array& source,long firstColumnToCopy,long lastColumnToCopy,long startingColumn){
00136     long nbColumnsToCopy = lastColumnToCopy - firstColumnToCopy + 1;
00137     for(long i = 0;i < nbRows;++i)
00138       memcpy(&array[i * nbColumns + startingColumn - 1],&(source.array[i * source.nbColumns + (firstColumnToCopy - 1)]),
00139              nbColumnsToCopy * sizeof(T));
00140   };
00141   
00145   inline void fillWithZeros(){
00146    memset(array,0,static_cast<unsigned int>(nbRows * nbColumns) * sizeof(T));   
00147   };
00148 
00149 
00150   inline Array<T>& operator=(const Array<T>& source){
00151    if(&source != this){
00152     nbColumns = source.nbColumns;
00153     nbRows = source.nbRows;   
00154     if(array) delete[]array;
00155     array = new T[nbRows * nbColumns];
00156     memcpy(array,source.array,nbRows * nbColumns * sizeof(T));
00157    } 
00158     return *this;
00159   };
00160     
00161 protected:
00162   long nbColumns;
00163   long nbRows;
00164   T* array;
00165 
00166 };

00175 template <class T>
00176 class pArray : public Array<T>{
00177 
00178 protected:
00179   using Array<T>::nbColumns;
00180   using Array<T>::nbRows;
00181   using Array<T>::array;
00182 
00183 public:
00184      inline pArray(){};
00185      inline ~pArray(){};
00186 
00187 
00192   inline void copyAndPrependColumn(pArray& source){
00193    for(long i = 0;i < nbRows;++i){
00194     for(int j = 0;j<nbColumns;++j){
00195      array[i*nbColumns + (j + 1)] = source.array[i*source.nbColumns + j];
00196     }
00197    }
00198   };
00199 
00206   inline void copySubset(pArray& source,long lastColumnToCopy){
00207  for(long i = 0;i < nbRows;++i){
00208     for(int j = 0;j<lastColumnToCopy;++j){
00209      array[i*lastColumnToCopy + j] = source.array[i*source.nbColumns + j];
00210     }
00211    }
00212   };
00213 
00222   inline void copySubset(pArray& source,long firstColumnToCopy,long lastColumnToCopy,long startingColumn){
00223    long nbColumnsToCopy = lastColumnToCopy - firstColumnToCopy + 1;
00224     for(long i = 0;i < nbRows;++i){
00225     for(int j = 0;j< nbColumnsToCopy;++j){
00226      array[i*nbColumns + (startingColumn - 1) + j] = source.array[i*source.nbColumns + (firstColumnToCopy - 1) + j];
00227     }
00228    }
00229   };
00230   
00231    
00232   inline pArray<T>& operator=(pArray<T>& source){
00233     nbColumns = source.nbColumns;
00234     nbRows = source.nbRows;
00235     if(array) delete[]array;
00236     array = new T[nbRows * nbColumns];
00237     for(int i = 0;i<nbRows;++i){
00238       for(int j = 0;j<nbColumns;++j){
00239       array[i*nbColumns + j] = source.array[i*nbColumns + j];
00240      } 
00241     }
00242     return *this;
00243   };
00244 
00245   inline pArray<T> operator=(pArray<T>& source) const{
00246     nbColumns = source.nbColumns;
00247     nbRows = source.nbRows;
00248     if(array) delete[]array;
00249     array = new T[nbRows * nbColumns];
00250     for(int i = 0;i<nbRows;++i){
00251      for(int j = 0;j<nbColumns;++j){
00252       array[i*nbColumns + j] = source.array[i*nbColumns + j];
00253      }
00254     }
00255     return *this;
00256   };
00257 };
